name: Me, Myself and Die
description:
Me, Myself and Die A short game where you jump, die, and respawn your way to victory!

Are you alone when you're with your skeleton? 

My very first game and Game Jam!

This was so much fun to work on and I can't wait to do another!

Controls

A and D - Move Left and Right

Space - Jump

Q - Die

E - Respawn

Z - Restart level

Clicking the Skull on the Start and End scene will quit the game.

See if you can beat my lowest death count for each level! Level123456Deaths132255
